query:
SELECT am.id, am.app_id, am.module_code as am_code, mt.module_code as mt_code, mt.module_name
FROM app_modules am
LEFT JOIN module_templates mt ON am.module_code = mt.module_code
WHERE am.app_id = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HmF555sZ6wXsVo.885fbf394348 --database cSZcQBnZuHpLU79S85jppV --execute SELECT am.id, am.app_id, am.module_code as am_code, mt.module_code as mt_code, mt.module_name
FROM app_modules am
LEFT JOIN module_templates mt ON am.module_code = mt.module_code
WHERE am.app_id = 1;
